meanings.definition: A North African dish of steamed semolina.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious couscous for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating couscous with vegetables and chicken.
meanings.sent3: The couscous on my plate looked like tiny grains of sand.
meanings.sent4: The steam rising from the couscous pot created a magical cloud.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the couscous filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: Small granules of semolina used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I bought a bag of couscous to make a quick meal.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a cup of couscous to be added to the broth.
meanings.sent3: The couscous spilled all over the kitchen counter, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: Each tiny couscous granule absorbed the flavorful broth.
meanings.sent5: The chef sprinkled the couscous on top of the salad for added texture.
